chapters.description: Understanding the field of data science, its applications, and career paths.
chapters.goal: Define data science and its key concepts.
chapters.mini_project: Analyze a dataset of your choice and present your findings.

chapters.description: Learning to handle and prepare data for analysis using Python libraries like Pandas.
chapters.mini_project: Clean and prepare a messy dataset from a public repository.

chapters.description: Exploring data using visualizations and summary statistics to identify patterns and trends.
chapters.goal: Perform exploratory data analysis on a dataset.
chapters.mini_project: Visualize and analyze a dataset related to your interests.

chapters.description: Understanding supervised learning algorithms like linear regression, logistic regression, and decision trees.
chapters.mini_project: Build a simple linear regression model to predict a variable.

chapters.description: Exploring unsupervised learning algorithms like k-means clustering and principal component analysis.
chapters.goal: Apply unsupervised learning to explore data.
chapters.mini_project: Perform k-means clustering on a dataset of your choice.

chapters.description: Learning to evaluate the performance of machine learning models and select the best model for a given task.
chapters.goal: Evaluate and compare machine learning models.
chapters.mini_project: Evaluate the performance of different models on a classification task.

chapters.description: Understanding the basics of deep learning and neural networks.
chapters.goal: Grasp the fundamentals of deep learning.
chapters.mini_project: Build a simple neural network from scratch using JavaScript.

chapters.description: Learning to use TensorFlow.js for building and training deep learning models in JavaScript.
chapters.goal: Implement deep learning models using TensorFlow.js.
chapters.mini_project: Build a simple image classification model using TensorFlow.js.

chapters.description: Exploring advanced deep learning concepts like convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and recurrent neural networks (RNNs).
chapters.mini_project: Build a simple CNN or RNN model for a specific task.

chapters.description: Learning the basics of React.js for building interactive data visualizations.
chapters.mini_project: Create a simple React application with basic components.

chapters.description: Exploring popular data visualization libraries for React, such as D3.js and Chart.js.
chapters.goal: Use data visualization libraries in React.
chapters.mini_project: Build a data visualization using D3.js or Chart.js in a React application.

chapters.description: Creating interactive dashboards using React and data visualization libraries.
chapters.mini_project: Build a simple interactive dashboard with multiple visualizations.

roadmap.module: Data Science Ethics and Professional Development

chapters.description: Understanding the ethical implications of data science and responsible data handling.
chapters.goal: Apply ethical principles in data science projects.
chapters.mini_project: Analyze a dataset and identify potential ethical concerns.

chapters.description: Learning to effectively communicate data insights to stakeholders through storytelling and visualizations.
chapters.goal: Present data insights in a clear and compelling manner.
chapters.mini_project: Create a presentation summarizing findings from a data analysis project.

chapters.description: Exploring different career paths in data science and developing a professional development plan.
chapters.goal: Define career goals and develop a plan for professional growth.
chapters.mini_project: Research different data science roles and identify your preferred path.
